content:
by  Nicole TommerdahlPublished  October  

Gophers win Minnesota ended the Badgers threegame win streak with a  win at home tonight PERIOD The team outproduced the Badgers in shots on goal  PERIOD In a dramatic save Gophers goalkeeper Lindsey Dare stopped a shot in the eighty-seventh minute to stave off overtime PERIOD Wisconsins only goal in the game was the Gophers first goal allowed at home this season PERIOD With the win the Gophers advance their record to  Overall  in the Big Ten PERIOD The team will take on the Northwestern Wildcats at  p.m PERIOD Sunday at home PERIOD  Gophers score Clare Grimwood took a long shot from Badgers territory to put Minnesota up  with the assist coming from teammate Kaitlin Wagner PERIOD The goal is only her second of the season PERIOD Though she has had a scoring drought recently this season Grimwood and Wagner are at the top of the Gophers offense tonight PERIOD The two have three points apiece this evening PERIOD At the half The game remains tied at one with Minnesota holding the advantage in shots  PERIOD There have been several close saves on both sides with Minnesotas Kaitlin Wagner and Wisconsins Leigh Williams scoring the games only goals PERIOD Clare Grimwood Kaitlin Wagner and Kelsey Hood drew firsthalf yellow cards for the Gophers PERIOD Wisconsin has drawn two yellow cards as a team PERIOD Not unsurprisingly this border battle has been a physical game thus far PERIOD  Badgers score Soon after the Gophers goal the Badgers marched down the field to score their first goal of the game PERIOD Freshman midfielder Leigh Williams tallied to tie the game at one apiece PERIOD  Gophers score Kaitlin Wagner found the back of the net in the twenty-fifth minute of the game with her fifth goal of the season assisted by Clare Grimwood PERIOD The assist was her first of the season PERIOD

The Gophers are playing the Badgers tonight in the only game of this weekends border battle fans will be able to see in the Twin Cities PERIOD As the Gophers wind their Big Ten season down they are on the hunt to break several Big Ten records PERIOD Expect all of the Gophers to stand out but watch Lindsey Dare as she looks to improve her Big Ten leading . goals Against Average PERIOD I will be giving you ingame updates so check back often
